title: What was the happier music video by Ed Sheeran trying to convey? What is the story? - Quora

response.answer_text: *Note~ Question is merged Question I had answered was ‘What does happier song is about?* ‘Happier’ is a breakup song more likely to be a song for a ‘guy dumped by girl after a long relationship’ This song is about breakup of a long relationship but the girl is moved on and is happy now likely she dumped him now and lost feelings for a guy. But guy can’t move on he can’t love someone again maybe. He still loves her. ‘’Ain't nobody hurt you like I hurt youBut ain't nobody need you like I do’’ This lines kinda reminds me of my furst breakup. I never cared of her when she was with me. She used to do special things for me. I tried to push her a little by little. She still tried to stay with me. She realised she can’t hold any longer and brokeup with me. Now I miss her alot and begged her to come back she loves someone and is happy with him. It’s kinda hurting. I want her back.

There is no official video of the song “Happier” by Ed Sheeran. The video which appears as the top result stars Chris Evans and Alice Eve. It is a very well-crafted compilation of clippings from the movie “Before We Go”. I too was intrigued by the video at first and wasn’t able to decipher what it is trying to convey. I had to watch the movie to understand the context. The movie is a good watch so instead of reiterating the story, I’d recommend watching the movie.
